segments.text: I am looking at this woman, and I can't quite believe what I'm seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, so focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hands are methodically working the towel over the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, though, and the water is gushing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s completely filling the sink basin and spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water is pouring onto the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her shoe is already soaked, submerged in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water creeping around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me angry how unaware she is of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so close to a real mess, and she just doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside starkly contrasts with this watery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn that faucet off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just baffling to witness such total distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the water damage isn't too severe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR
